usage_instructions.confluent_cloud_console: Copy the 'payload' object and paste it into the Confluent Cloud Console message producer
usage_instructions.kafka_console_producer: Use the command: docker exec -i containerapp-kafka-1 kafka-console-producer --broker-list localhost:9092 --topic <topic-name>
usage_instructions.note: Make sure to use the correct topic name (weather-alerts or general-events) when producing messages
